original_text: Then Asa took all the silver and the gold that were left in the treasures of the house of the Lord and the treasures of the king's house and gave them into the hands of his servants. And King Asa sent them to Ben-hadad the son of Tabrimmon, the son of Hezion, king of Syria, who lived in Damascus, saying,
korean_text: 아사가 여호와의 성전 곳간과 왕궁 곳간에 남은 은금을 모두 가져다가 그 신하의 손에 넘겨 다메섹에 거주하고 있는 아람의 왕 헤시온의 손자 다브림몬의 아들 벤하닷에게 보내며 이르되

sentences.original_text: Then Asa took all the silver and the gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 아사는 모든 은과 금을 취하고

sentences.original_text: that were left in the treasures of the house of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 주의 집 보물고에 남아 있었고

sentences.original_text: and the treasures of the king's house
and gave them into the hands of his servants
to Ben-hadad the son of Tabrimmon
